Odin -> WASM + WebGL Demos

Demo projects using Odin compiled to WebAssembly and rendered using WebGL

  • Multi Example

    Cycle shader, texture, and geometry independently

  • Particles!

    Trail of particles following mouse cursor

  • Rectangle

    A spinning rectangle

  • Inputs Test

    Test keyboard, mouse, and gamepad inputs

  • Camera

    Control 3d movement and camera with mouse & keyboard or gamepad

  • Shapes

    Draw rectangles, circles, and lines

  • Wave Function Collapse

    Implementation of wave function collapse using a tilemap

  • Synth Keyboard

    Play notes on a keyboard

  • Sound Effects

    Sound effects with volume slider and spatial audio

  • Game of Life

    Implementation of Conway's Game of Life with patches to give illusion of infinite size
